A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Yes\, there’s plenty of action and CGI happening in this movie\, however the plot smells a little bit of Empire Strikes Back/Return of the Jedi mulligan stew. Ridley certainly goes through the training “cave” that Luke once experienced after meeting Yoda and she soon races off to save her friends. The Rebel fleet is once again fleeing a base and General Leia\, well her performance is better than the plastic surgery she’s received although the years of booze and drugs took a toll on her voice. Chewbacca and the droids put in the best performance and Adam Driver still isn’t a convincing Emperor\, but he tries and fails miserably. I do not like what Disney is doing with this franchise\, but let’s face it\, it’s Disney and it only cares about the dollars rather than a plausible story line.
